titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a postage stamp should be issued honoring William Holmes McGuffey, author of the McGuffey Readers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

bill.summary: 9/29/1999--Introduced. Calls for the Citizen's Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend and the Postal Service to issue a postage stamp honoring William Holmes McGuffey, author of the McGuffey Readers.
